# Ocean Reporting Website - Next.js Project

## Project Overview
Professional ocean incident reporting website with interactive maps, animations, and stunning UI.

## Stack
- Next.js 15 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Three.js for 3D graphics
- GSAP for animations
- Framer Motion
- Leaflet/React-Leaflet for maps
- Additional animation libraries

## Features
- Interactive map with incident markers
- Report submission form
- Real-time alerts and danger zones
- Beautiful animations and 3D effects
- Professional and responsive design
